HomePage.title: OG Lab – Perfect Cannabis
HomePage.subtitle: Cannabis Dispensary and Farm on Koh Samui
HomePage.whyChoosePart2: – where quality meets culture. Discover live cultivation, explore our scientific area, and enjoy products made with passion and precision. OG Lab is the destination for every cannabis lover.
HomePage.featureFarmToursDescription: Cannabis tours to our farm with scientific area with indoor grow and outdoor cannabis garden. See the growing process with your own eyes!
HomePage.featureEventsDescription: Every 3 weeks we organize amazing parties for our community. Join us for unforgettable experiences!
HomePage.featureRecognizedDescription: Our cannabis is recognized at national competitions. Every award is proof of our uncompromising quality.
HomePage.featureBestPricesDescription: Best prices directly from the producer! Maximum quality, freshest cannabis straight from the farm.
HomePage.featureScientificDescription: Scientific area with big observation window. Innovative growing methods and quality control systems.
HomePage.featureMustVisitDescription: Competing for the best location title on Samui in TripAdvisor. Must visit place on the island!
HomePage.discoverGemText1: We invite you to discover the best-kept secret of Thailand and enjoy the warmth of our team and the quality of our products.
HomePage.discoverGemText2: More than a dispensary – a destination for true enthusiasts.
HomePage.finalSectionText: Let's work, learn and relax together!
HomePage.prescriptionSubtitle: Travel Safe. Smoke Free. No Stress
HomePage.newsDescription: We're launching a news feed right on our website. Aftermovie videos, farm photo galleries, and educational cannabis articles — all in one place, without blocks or restrictions. Ganja, cannabis, Marihuana, weed - ha-ha-ha, we'll show you everything here!
HomePage.agentDescription: OG Lab Agent uses internal knowledge, network, product inventory, and cross‑checks trusted sources. Can assist with ordering or forward a message to senior staff.
HomePage.agentPlaceholder: Ask anything: mood, format, potency, flavor…
HomePage.agentRecordingHint: Click the microphone to start recording, click again to stop (max {max} sec)
HomePage.agentResetConfirm: Are you sure? This will delete all history and stats.
HomePage.btsDescription: From seed to harvest — witness our dedication to quality at every step
